extendedInfo.description: A Beautiful Life Quote CollectionThis is a Pro Version of 'Beautiful Life Quotes' and this is also released for free. You can save your favorite quotes in this application. Over More than 500 quotesUpdated Daily with hundreds of life quotes said by different people.Quotes about motivation, love, lovers, girls, boys, mother, father, happy, angry, sad, emotions, feelings, friendship, relationship, friend, relation, smile, people, sky, dream, life, nature, hate, pretty, beautiful, attitude, country, classic, music, art, dance, advice and much moreYou can send cool quotes as an SMS or email, share on Facebook and Twitter

reviews.title: Pathetic
reviews.comment: Everything is spelt wrong, the grammar is atrocious, and there are words missing from the quotes. Really takes away from the quality and meaning of the quote.  My advice: install something else if you actually want something mature.
